title: Preferred social login ID worldwide 2016
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of logins in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of logins is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Live.
The minimum Platform Live has got 482.73 times less Share of logins than the maximum Platform Facebook.
min_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of logins in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of logins is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Live.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of logins in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of logins is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Live.
The minimum Platform Live has got 482.73 times less Share of logins than the maximum Platform Facebook.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of logins in each Platform on the y axis.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of logins and Live has the lowest Share of logins.
The second highest Share of logins is appeared to be the Platform GooglePlus.
There is a difference of 52.99 between the maximum Platform Facebook and minimum Platform Live.
Share of logins at Platform Facebook is 53.1 , second place is GooglePlus at 44.8, and thirdly is Twitter at 1.01.
The Platform Facebook has 3.72 times more Share of logins than average.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 100.02.
